Sentence: On her (Sonya) way back to her (Sonya) apartment, Sonya is followed by a strange man, who we later learn is Svidrigailov--Dunya's lecherous former employer who is obsessively attracted to her (Sonya)
After Svidrigailov leaves, Raskolnikov and Razumikhin walk to a restaurant to meet Dunya, Pulcheria Alexandrovna, and Luzhin
They discuss Svidrigailov's arrival in the city and the money that has been offered to Dunya
Svidrigailov tells him (Petrovich) that though he (Petrovich) is still attracted to Dunya, he (Petrovich) has gotten engaged to a sixteen-year-old girl
Svidrigailov parts from Raskolnikov and manages to bring Dunya to his (Petrovich) room, where he (Petrovich) threatens to rape her (girl) after she (girl) refuses to marry him (Petrovich)
